about_the_game:
Emilia's family members start mysteriously vanishing, whisked away one-by-one as if by magic. Setting off to search the world for any traces of them, she is unceremoniously forced to do bidding of an ancient wolf spirit. Is the power Emilia gains from it free to be made her own? Are the spirits her allies, or is she being led astray? And is she even looking in the right place?

Embark on a fairytale metroidvania-style platforming adventure in pursuit of power, memories and truth!



Explore the beautifully handcrafted pixel-art world, from autumn forests to frigid mountain tops, caves, castles and more!
Hone your abilities as the memories of your lost family members come back, one by one - or prove you don't need "medicine" to persevere!



Features:
  • Moody, expressive pixel art!
  • Satisfying exploration of a varied, vibrant world!
  • Fluid and intuitive movement!
  • Well-balanced difficulty - challenging, but not too much!

This, and more awaits you in the world both ethereal and unforgiving!

short_description: Emilia's life turns into chaos as her family members disappear, one by one. Forced to put her trust in a wolf spirit, Emilia sets off to search the land while pressured into feeding a monstrous power. Will the enigmatic figure she encounters offer guidance, or is Emilia diving head-first into peril?
